textAfterTable: Orders shipping to Hawaii or Alaska must ship via 2 Day Air. Unfortunately, ground and overnight shipping is not available to these destinations. We are happy to ship to APO/FPO locations. However due to the complex nature of these distribution points we cannot guarantee expedited shipping. Please allow additional delivery time for orders shipping to these locations. FREE SHIPPING. ANY TIME*. See details.
